core

Class AStar

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.AStar

  • public class AStar
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the code for the A* algorithm.
    Author:
    dennis

    • Field Detail

      • closedList

        private java.util.List<State> closedList
        The history of the state space visited to the destination is stored in a local variable history.

      • currentState

        private State currentState
        The currentState hold the currentState of the problem. It is initialized with the initial state.

      • goalState

        private State goalState
        The goalState holds the goal state of the problem. This variable is used as part of goalTest().

      • openList

        private java.util.PriorityQueue<State> openList
        The priority queue that is used to

    • Constructor Detail

      • AStar

        public AStar(State initState,
     State goalState,
     int rowSize,
     int columnSize)
        Initializing AStar algorithm by initializing the history variable, the initState and goalState.
        Parameters:
        currentState - The begin state of the 8 puzzle problem.
        goalState - The goal state of the 8 puzzle problem which is used in goalTest().

    • Method Detail

      • getClosedList

        public java.util.List<State> getClosedList()
        Returns:
        the number of states explored during the search process.

      • getOpenList

        public java.util.PriorityQueue<State> getOpenList()
        Returns:
        the number of states that are to be explored in the next level.

      • goalTest

        private boolean goalTest()
        checks if the currentState is the goalState the goalTest succeeds and fails otherwise.
        Returns:
        result of the goal test

      • search

        public java.util.List<State> search()
        searches the state space tree and returns the path to the goal state.
        Returns:
        path to the goal state.

      • generateSuccessors

        private java.util.List<State> generateSuccessors(State currentState,
                                       State goalState)
        Generates the successor states from the current state. It does not calculate the heuristics function of the state.
        Parameters:
        currentState - parent to the successor states
        Returns:
        the generated states (successors)
